ygData.subject: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow Clerics I was curious as to the types of plate armor available to us... like what kinds there are and how hard they are to obtain.. i refuse
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings fellow Clerics

I was curious as to the types of plate armor available to us... like what
kinds there are and how hard they are to obtain.. i refuse to wear anything
other than plate... (i'm a big looks are important person =)) and the bronze
is just to heavy for my DE cleric.... i know rubi is an option and even
though i could camp it.. i really don't want to spend that much time to get a
good set... i also have about 1900pp in the bank so i could buy some of the
platemail from merchants.. but with all that i could only get like 4 of the
lesser pieces.... I have heard about silver plated pieces (mainly leggings...
are there any others?) and mithril... does anyone know of any others? or have
info on what might be a good way to obtain some sort of armor to replace my
bronze? either more pp for platemail or maybe a spoiler on mithril, like
where and what level... any help is greatly appreciated =)

Thralkin
Veeshan
